item.title: Timer help
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok, i wass adding a timer from this and the timers not working this is where i added it client plz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if(isWild() && plz.isWild() && plz != null /*&& CheckInRange()*/) { faceNPC(32768+AttackingOn); IsAttacking = true; inCombat(); } if(plz.attackingPlayerId != playerId && plz.attackingPlayerId != 0) { sendMessage("That player is already in combat."); attackingPlayerId = 0; ResetAttack(); break; } if(FightDelayz > 0) { FightDelayz--; } if(FightDelayz <= 0) { attackingPlayerId = 0; FightDelayz = 20; } did i do something wrong?

tut link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,238730.0.html

Read full topic
